description: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills that reserve mana cannot be triggered.

mods.text: Supported Skills require % reduced amount of Damage taken to Trigger
Supported Skills have % increased Skill Effect Duration

mods: Trigger Supported Spells when you take a total of (528–3272) Damage
This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level (38–70) or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
name: Cast when Damage Taken Support
